resources.string: Welcome,\n\n there was no account for you yet - so one was created. Note - this one is not secured with any password for easy use - so only use it as a hot walleth for a few beverages.

This is a native Android Ethereum wallet.

It uses the in process node as ethereum light client from the go-ethereum project.

Big shout out to karalabe, fjl and obscuren here - awesome work guys!

This alpha uses the rinkeby testnet.

WALLΞTH is trying to be as decentralized as possible. Unfortunately complete we cannot be fully decentralized yet. For getting the exchange rates for (fiat) references we are querying cryptocompare and to get transactions we use the great etherscan.io service.

Our wonderful Icon is from Michael Cook.

Be aware that this is an alpha and there will be bugs. There are also some known issues like this one and this one
